summary: This is a follower named after me. He has a Glass weapon and a lot of spells he can use. He is level 50.
descriptionHtml:
This is a follower named after me. He has a Glass weapon and a lot of spells he can use. He is level 50. I made him originally as a regular NPC but later edited him into a follower. Voice will probably be added later. You can find him in the Bee and Barb in Riften, he mostly just sits around and leans on the wall. He should be easy to find. If you would like to voice him, let me know somehow.

Skills:
Level 15: 1 Handed, 2 Handed, Archery, Block, Smithing, Heavy Armor, Light Armor, Pickpocket, Lockpicking, Enchanting.
Level 20: Alchemy, Speech, Illusion.
Level 72: Conjuration.
Level 98: Sneak
Level 100: Alteration, Destruction, Restoration.

Spells:
Incinerate, InvisibilityBothHands, LightningStorm, Magelight, ReanimateCorpseLeftHand, Telekinesis, Thunderbolt, WallOfFlames, WardGreater.

Outfit & Inventory:
Outfit: CollegeExpertDestructionOutfit
Inventory: EnchGlassDaggerFear05, StaffConjureStormAtronach

Taken right from the Creation Kit!

I added a version that levels with the player.
author: Dogrules23
